data.actual_result: Discord Canary randomly crashes and restarts. When I'm in a voice channel it does rejoin after Discord has restarted.
data.expected_result: Discord Canary isn't supposed to randomly crash during games.
data.short_description: Discord Canary restarts when playing Rainbow Six Siege
data.steps_to_repro: - I use Discord Canary to chat and speak to other people in the community. - I launch Rainbow Six Siege via Steam. - Discord Canary crashes and restarts multiple times during my playsession. The interval of the crashes differs every time.- I also have Spotify up and playing during the launch of the game with Steam.
